Uses of Interface
io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.seed.SeedGenerator

  • Packages that use SeedGenerator 
    Package Description
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng
    Subclasses of Random using different random-number generation algorithms.
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter
    Implementations of Random backed by instances of SplittableRandom.
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.seed
    Tools to obtain and apply truly-random seeds for Random implementations, especially those that also implement ByteArrayReseedableRandom.

    • Uses of SeedGenerator in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng

      Fields in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng with type parameters of type SeedGenerator 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected AtomicReference<SeedGenerator> BaseRandom.seedGenerator
      If the referent is non-null, it will be invoked to reseed this PRNG whenever random output is taken and BaseRandom.getEntropyBits() called immediately afterward would return zero or negative.
      Methods in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng that return SeedGenerator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SeedGenerator BaseRandom.getSeedGenerator()
      Returns the current seed generator for this PRNG.
      Methods in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng with parameters of type SeedGenerator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BaseRandom.setSeedGenerator(SeedGenerator seedGenerator)
      Registers this PRNG with the RandomSeederThread for the corresponding SeedGenerator, to schedule reseeding when we run out of entropy.
      Constructors in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng with parameters of type SeedGenerator 
      Constructor and Description
      AesCounterRandom(SeedGenerator seedGenerator)
      Seed the RNG using the provided seed generation strategy to create a 256-bit seed.

      Creates a new RNG and seeds it using the provided seed generation strategy.

      SplittableRandomAdapter(SeedGenerator seedGenerator)
      Use the provided seed generation strategy to create the seed for the master SplittableRandom, which will be split to generate an instance for each thread.

    • Uses of SeedGenerator in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.seed

      Classes in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.seed that implement SeedGenerator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BufferedSeedGenerator
      A seed generator that wraps another, maintaining a buffer of previously-downloaded bytes to reduce the number of I/O calls.
      class  DefaultSeedGenerator
      Seed generator that is the default for the program where it is running.
      class  DevRandomSeedGenerator
      RNG seed strategy that gets data from /dev/random on systems that provide it (e.g.
      class  RandomDotOrgSeedGenerator
      Connects to random.org's old API (via HTTPS) and downloads a set of random bits to use as seed data.
      class  SecureRandomSeedGenerator
      SeedGenerator implementation that uses Java's bundled SecureRandom RNG to generate random seed data.
      class  SeedGeneratorPreferenceList
      A SeedGenerator implementation that iterates over multiple delegates until one succeeds.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void RandomSeederThread.add(SeedGenerator seedGenerator, Random... randoms)
      Add one or more Random instances to the thread for the given SeedGenerator.
      static void RandomSeederThread.clear(SeedGenerator seedGenerator)
      Removes all PRNGs from a given seed generator's thread.
      static boolean RandomSeederThread.hasInstance(SeedGenerator seedGenerator)
      Returns whether a RandomSeederThread using the given SeedGenerator is running or not.
      static boolean RandomSeederThread.isEmpty(SeedGenerator seedGenerator) 
      static void RandomSeederThread.remove(SeedGenerator seedGenerator, Random... randoms)
      Remove one or more Random instances from the thread for the given SeedGenerator if such a thread exists and contains them.
      static void DefaultSeedGenerator.set(SeedGenerator delegate) 
      static void RandomSeederThread.setPriority(SeedGenerator seedGenerator, int priority)
      Sets the priority of a random-seeder thread, starting it if it's not already running.
      static void RandomSeederThread.stopIfEmpty(SeedGenerator seedGenerator) 
      static boolean RandomSeederThread.wakeUp(SeedGenerator seedGenerator)
      Notifies the thread for the given SeedGenerator that PRNGs are waiting to be reseeded.
